TopicTitle: Unknown Impuls Still Exists When Engine is off.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.1

OS: Windows 11

CPU: 12700H, GPU: 3070ti, RAM: 65GB

In low Mun orbit, the sapcecraft still gets a impuls when engine is off. This will cause the PE getting lower and AP getting higher. The lower, the more obvious.

Step to replicate: launch any spacecraft to low Mun orbit.

NO MODS.

vodeo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rcl4shtNMEM

Pay attention to the bottom left corner. the PE and AP is changing.

 

Edited March 17, 2023 by 机械主教71号
